    Apply: MuSyC Model -- KCNQ Conductance Apply: Sigmoid Model -- KOR Antagonists Apply: Sigmoid Model -- Pnear Folding Funnel Apply: tQ Model -- ChABC Design Apply: tQ Model -- nSMase2 Kinetics Derive: MuSyC Model -- Synergy Analysis Derive: tQ Model -- Enzyme Kinetics Implement: BayesPharma and Tidymodels

    Function reference

    All functions

    MuSyC()
    Generate MuSyC Ed scores using a robust functional form
    MuSyC_formula()
    Create a formula for the MuSyC synergy model
    MuSyC_hi_to_si()
    Convert slope parametrization to exponent parametrization for drug i
    MuSyC_init()
    Create initialization for the MuSyC model
    MuSyC_model()
    MuSyC Synergy Model
    MuSyC_prior()
    Default priors for the MuSyC model
    MuSyC_si_to_hi()
    Convert from slope parametrization to the exponent parametrization for drug i
    Pnear()
    Compute the Pnear quality metric for RMSD funnel
    basic_stats()
    Displays a data.frame of basic statistical information about the model results
    calculate_log_dose()
    Add a log dose (in base 10) column to the input data.frame
    constant_formula()
    Formula for a curve with a constant response
    density_distributions_plot()
    Create a plot of the density distributions of modeled parameters from brmsfit model
    drc_model()
    Wrapper for DRC dose response models
    kor_antag
    Dose Response Measurements of Four Different Kappa Opioid Receptor Antagonists
    plot_drc()
    Create plot of drc model
    plot_pp_check()
    Perform Posterior Predictive Check
    plot_synergy_checkerboard()
    Plot synergy checkerboard
    posterior_densities_plot()
    Create a plot of the posterior density distributions of modeled parameters from brmsfit model
    posterior_draws_plot()
    Plot of Posterior Model Fit Draws
    prepare_init()
    Prepare an init for a brms model
    prepare_prior()
    Prepare a brmsprior
    prior_posterior_densities_plot()
    Create a plot of the prior & posterior density distributions of modeled parameters from brmsfit model
    sigmoid()
    Sigmoid Function
    sigmoid_agonist_formula()
    Create an agonist sigmoid formula for the brms model
    sigmoid_agonist_init()
    Create initialization for the agonist sigmoid model
    sigmoid_agonist_model()
    Run Bayesian Sigmoid Agonist Model
    sigmoid_agonist_prior()
    Default priors for the sigmoid agonist model
    sigmoid_antagonist_formula()
    Create an antagonist sigmoid formula for the brms model
    sigmoid_antagonist_init()
    Create initialization for the antagonist sigmoid model
    sigmoid_antagonist_model()
    Run Bayesian Sigmoid Antagonist Model
    sigmoid_antagonist_prior()
    Default priors for the sigmoid antagonist model
    sigmoid_stanvar
    Stan code for the sigmoid function.
    tQ_formula()
    Define formula for the tQ enzyme kinetics model
    tQ_init()
    Initialize parameter values for the tQ enyzme kinetic model
    tQ_model()
    Model for the tQ enzyme kinetics model
    tQ_model_generate()
    Generate data from the total QSSA model for enzyme kinetics
    tQ_prior()
    Define priors for the tQ enzyme kinetics model
    tQ_stanvar
    stanvar for the tQ enzyme kinetics model

    Developed by Madeline Martin, Matthew O’Meara.
